name: Wheat
overview: Wheat is a staple grain rich in protein and fiber.
growth: Requires temperate climate and well-drained soil.
season: Sown in winter, harvested in spring.
uses: Used in bread, pasta, and flour production.

name: Rice
overview: Rice is a primary food source in Asia.
growth: Thrives in flooded fields and warm climates.
season: Planted in monsoon, harvested in autumn.
uses: Consumed as staple food, used in snacks and flour.
